entries.content: Frame initial value proposition around potential cost savings without knowing the current supplier or terms.
When a prospect indicates they are not looking now but might in the future, acknowledge their timeline and offer to be a resource.
Validate the prospect's current situation or supplier by stating you assume they are getting the best deal possible.
entries.notes: Used to disarm potential competitive tension and avoid attacking current providers.

entries.content: I'm sure they're not looking to change anything today and I'm sure you're getting the best deal possible.
entries.notes: Used to preemptively address competitive objections by validating the status quo.

entries.content: Position yourself as a potential future resource even when the prospect is not ready to buy now.

focus_area: Competitive Objections: Unique value framing without attacking others
